query.default: select * from lenspec_Reports_UnsentMassEmails where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by LineNumber;

query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) not null, [LineNumber] int not null, [DocumentName] nvarchar(max) null, [RegistrationNumber] nvarchar(max) null, [Correspondent] nvarchar(max) null, [Error] nvarchar(max) null, [DocumentId] nvarchar(max) null, [DocumentHyperlink] nvarchar(max) null)
query.postgres: create table {0} (ReportSessionId varchar(256) not null, LineNumber integer not null, DocumentName citext null, RegistrationNumber citext null, Correspondent citext null, Error citext null, DocumentId citext null, DocumentHyperlink citext null);
